test.subject: english
test.name: Tiếng Anh 10 - Unit 7: International Organisations
test.description: Kiểm tra kiến thức về các tổ chức quốc tế và ngữ pháp so sánh hơn/nhất của tính từ.

questions.question: Choose the word whose underlined part is pronounced differently.
questions.explanation: Question: đuôi -tion phát âm là /tʃən/. Các từ còn lại phát âm là /ʃən/.

questions.question: Choose the word with a different stress pattern.
questions.explanation: Develop nhấn âm 2. Các từ còn lại nhấn âm 1.

questions.question: Vietnam has become an active ________ of ASEAN since 1995.
questions.explanation: Active member: thành viên tích cực.

questions.question: The United Nations works to maintain international ________ and security.
questions.explanation: Peace and security: hòa bình và an ninh.

questions.question: This is the ________ building in the city.
questions.explanation: So sánh nhất (the + adj_est) với tính từ ngắn.

questions.question: UNICEF aims to support ________ children and mothers.
questions.explanation: Disadvantaged children: trẻ em chịu thiệt thòi.

questions.question: This issue is ________ than I thought.
questions.explanation: So sánh hơn với tính từ dài (more ... than).

questions.question: Vietnam is one of the ________ growing economies in the region.
questions.explanation: One of the fastest: một trong những... nhanh nhất.

questions.question: WHO stands for World ________ Organization.
questions.explanation: WHO = World Health Organization (Tổ chức Y tế Thế giới).

questions.question: He is ________ student in the class.
questions.explanation: So sánh nhất của 'good' là 'the best'.

questions.question: Joining international organizations brings many ________ to Vietnam.
questions.explanation: Bring benefits: mang lại lợi ích.

questions.question: Which sentence is correct?

options.text: She is more happier than me.
She is the happier than me.

questions.explanation: Happy -> Happier (tính từ kết thúc bằng 'y' coi như tính từ ngắn).

questions.question: The WTO focuses on international ________.
questions.explanation: WTO = World Trade Organization (Tổ chức Thương mại Thế giới).

questions.question: Living in the city is often ________ than living in the countryside.
questions.explanation: Expensive là tính từ dài -> more expensive.

questions.question: Vietnam aims to ________ its relations with other countries.
questions.explanation: Promote relations: thúc đẩy quan hệ.

questions.question: For me, Maths is ________ than Physics.
questions.explanation: Easy -> Easier (so sánh hơn).

questions.question: We want to create a ________ world for everyone.
questions.explanation: A better world: một thế giới tốt đẹp hơn.

questions.question: FAO helps countries improve agriculture and ________ security.
questions.explanation: Food security: an ninh lương thực.

questions.question: That was the ________ movie I have ever seen.
questions.explanation: So sánh nhất với tính từ dài (the most boring).

questions.question: The main goal of UNICEF is to ________ children's rights.
questions.explanation: Protect rights: bảo vệ quyền lợi.
